title: Pompeo Says Diplomatic Way Forward with North Korea
itunes:title: Pompeo Says Diplomatic Way Forward with North Korea
description:
U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo discusses U.S. foreign policy and a potential U.S. Senate run with Kevin Cirilli, Chief Washington Correspondent for Bloomberg Television and Radio.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
